name: Ages of Extinction
description:
You play as a young god who is trying to raise a planet of people to eventually hang out with him. 

Use WASD to move, E to give life to a nearby planet, Space to dump a full bucket, and click to interact with planets and asteroids.

Devlog/Reflection coming soon at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7v3YEDa603x_84PgCPytzA (Youtube LogicProjects)

  • Game design and programming by Matthew Bryant
  • Art by Madeline Hunt
  • Sounds from freesounds.org
  • Music:

    • Sincerely by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5033-sincerely
    License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
